3 ALIGNINGState::ALIGNINGState(ros::NodeHandle node, RefuseBin bin) : move_base_clt_("move_base", false)
4 {
5  node_ = node;
6  bin_location_ = bin;
7  move_base_cancel_pub_ = node_.advertise<actionlib_msgs::GoalID>("/move_base/cancel", 0);
8  state_identifier_ = STATE_ALIGNING;
9 }

16 void ALIGNINGState::cancelGoal()
17 {
18  actionlib_msgs::GoalID cancel_all;
19  move_base_cancel_pub_.publish(cancel_all);
20  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Canceling move_base goal");
21 }

23 int ALIGNINGState::sendGoal(Goal new_goal)
24 {
25  int attempts = 0;
26  try
27  {
28  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(new_goal.x);
29  }
30  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &e)
31  {
32  ROS_INFO("%s", e.what());
33  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] x is undefined");
34  return -1;
35  }
36  try
37  {
38  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(new_goal.y);
39  }
40  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
41  {
42  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] y is undefined");
43  return -1;
44  }
45  try
46  {
47  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(new_goal.yaw);
48  }
49  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
50  {
51  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] yaw is undefined");
52  return -1;
53  }
54  while (!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)) || (attempts < 4))
55  {
56  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
57  attempts++;
58  }
59  if(attempts == 3)
60  {
61  ROS_WARN("Failed to contact move base server after four attempts, goal not published!");
62  return -1;
63  }
64 
65  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
66  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
67  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
68  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = new_goal.x;
69  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = new_goal.y;
70  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(new_goal.yaw);
71 
72  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
73 
74  return 1;
75 }
76 
77 Command ALIGNINGState::run()
78 {
79  ros::Rate rate(50);
80  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Aligning with garbage disposal...");
81  Command new_cmd;
82  new_cmd.state = STATE_IDLE;
83  Goal new_goal;
84  new_goal.x = bin_location_.x + 1.5 * cos(bin_location_.yaw);
85  new_goal.y = bin_location_.y + 1.5 * sin(bin_location_.yaw);
86  new_goal.yaw = bin_location_.yaw;
87  int goal_status = sendGoal(new_goal);
88  if(goal_status == -1)
89  {
90  return new_cmd;
91  }
92  while (true)
93  {
94  ros::spinOnce();
95  if(command.state != -1)
96  {
97  cancelGoal();
98  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] New command was issued, halting alignment.");
99  return command;
100  }
101  if(move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
102  {
103  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Robot has aligned with refuse bin, transmitting LIFT command.");
104  new_cmd.state = STATE_LIFT;
105  return new_cmd;
106  }
107  rate.sleep();
108  }
109 }
